entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
